attributes.action: Pay 75% of salary for the 14 days of self isolate because of coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: Because people will starve and not afford to pay bills.
attributes.background: The pay of SSP is not enough for 14 days to cover bills and all food you need

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302277

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
